gallery.title: Streaming Auditor mesure
gallery.author: Black Dragon ?
gallery.description: This graph waas made in order to have an idea of how many listerners are on the webradio every 5 minutes (in order to have a look on privileged listeing hours). It's an example of a "Blue Flaming". Thanks to ED and dedibox-news great helper team. If you want more explainations send me a mail.
